title: Frohsinn
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, International, Organic, Take-out, English, Fusion, Middle Eastern
description: A small 100% vegan/vegetarian cafe/frozen yogurt shop/cafe/restaurant with plenty of vegan options. Menu changes seasonally. Vegan items are frozen yogurt, porridge, rice pudding and semolina pudding (Griessbrei). Choice of toppings are Oreos, fruit, nuts and cereals. Coffee and teas are organic. All coffees also with soy/rice-milk (sometimes even more options) and they don't charge you extra for that.
